title: Sarah and The Stranger
description: SEEING IS BELIEVING....Wade Danforth was obsessed with beautiful things--women, cars, art. Then a Freak accident blinded him. Suddenly he was in darkness and could only see the world through the eyes of therapist Sarah Jane Morrison--whose tender loving care ignited a sizzling passion in him no other woman ever had....Sarah Jane suffered from plain looks ... and a fear of rejection. So when she was assigned to help the most gorgeous, sexy blind man she'd ever seen, how could she refuse? But she hadn't counted on the intoxicating effect her irresistible new patient would have on her senses, and her biggest fear still remained. What would happen when he regained his sight and could see her for the woman she really was?
author: Shawna Delacorte
